title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 153.8 - Compulsory participation prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 153.8 - Compulsory participation prohibited

State Regulations

No insurer shall provide coverage in regard to a group or quasi-group program that: (a) requires the purchase of insurance as a condition of group membership or quasi-group participation; or
(b) imposes any penalty upon a group member or quasi-group participant if insurance is not purchased. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
153.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
